title: WHO announces new expert group to investigate origins of the coronavirus and other outbreaks
content:
1. WHO announces new expert group to investigate origins of the coronavirus and other outbreaks  The Washington Post
  2. Covid-19 vaccine boosters are 'immoral' and 'unfair', says WHO chief  CNN
  3. WHO launches a new group to study the origins of the coronavirus  NPR
  4. WHO announces committee to probe COVID-19 pandemic origins  Fox News
  5. Coronavirus live updates: US to reopen Canada, Mexico land borders for vaccinated tourists  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: WHO、コロナウイルスなどの発生源を調査する新しい専門家グループを発表
世卫组织宣布成立新的专家组，调查冠状病毒和其他疫情的来源
世衛組織宣佈成立新的專家組，調查冠狀病毒和其他疫情的來源
